property.name: title
property.value: SOS URL

property.name: description
property.value: The endpoint URL of this sos which will be shown in the GetCapabilities response (e.g. http://localhost:8080/52nSOS/sos or http://localhost:8080/52nSOS/service). The path to a specific binding (like /soap) will appended to this URL. For detailed information, please read the documentation

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS support strict Spatial Filtering Profile?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should support strict SOS 2.0 Spatial Filtering Profile. That means each observation should contain a om:parameter with sampling geometry. Else the SOS allows observations without om:parameter with sampling geometry!

property.name: title
property.value: Sensor Directory

property.name: description
property.value: The path to a directory with the sensor descriptions in SensorML format. It can be either an absolute path (like /home/user/sosconfig/sensors) or a path relative to the web application classes directory (e.g. WEB-INF/classes/sensors).

property.name: title
property.value: Use default prefixes for offering, procedure, features

property.name: description
property.value: Use default prefixes for offering, procedure, features.

property.name: title
property.value: Deregister JDBC driver

property.name: description
property.value: Should the service deregister all used JDBC driver (SQLite, PostgreSQL or H2) during shutdown process.

property.name: title
property.value: Content cache persistence delay

property.name: description
property.value: The time in seconds, for which writing of an updated cache is delayed. Incremental cache updates that are executed during transactional operations are not immediately persistet, but are delayed to reduce write operations and to improve performance. The delay is the maximum time the persisted and in memory cache can diverge.

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS validate the XML response in non debug mode?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should validate the XML response when the debug mode is disables!

property.name: title
property.value: Block restrictionless requests

property.name: description
property.value: Should GetObservation requests without any restriction be blocked

property.name: title
property.value: Cache Feeder Threads

property.name: description
property.value: The number of threads used to fill the capabilities cache.

property.name: title
property.value: Content cache update interval

property.name: description
property.value: The update interval of the content cache in minutes. Set this to lower value if your database is externally modified frequently. Set to 0 to disable scheduled cache updates.

property.name: title
property.value: Content cache update interval

property.name: description
property.value: The update definition for the cache update. See http://www.quartz-scheduler.org/documentation/quartz-2.x/tutorials/crontrigger.html

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS expose child observable properties?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should expose the children of composite phenomenons (e.g. in complex observations) instead of their parents.

property.name: title
property.value: Should the service list only parent offerings in service capabilities?

property.name: description
property.value: The service would list only parent offerings in the serivce capabilites. Lower level offerings would be referenced in extension elements of related ObservationOfferings.

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS create the featureOfInterest geometry from samplingGeometries?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should create the featureOfInterest geometry from samplingGeometries.

property.name: title
property.value: Cache file folder

property.name: description
property.value: The path to a folder where the cache file should be stored. Default is the webapp folder. If you define a path, then grant the necessary rights (lt;code>write and read permission) to the application server user!

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS create the featureOfInterest geometry from samplingGeometries?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should expand the featureOfInterest geometry with the samplingGeometry from the inserted observation. Note: The geometries are added to the end of the LineString! Also if the new observation is between existing observations!

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS include the resultTime for merging?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should include the resultTime as inidcator when merging observations!

property.name: title
property.value: Should the SOS convert complex profiles to single profiles?

property.name: description
property.value: Should the SOS convert complex profiles to single profiles?

property.name: title
property.value: Should this SOS allow the insertion of procedure and featureOfInterest via InsertResult values?

property.name: description
property.value: Whether the SOS should allow to reference the procedure and featureOfInterest in the values of the InsertResult operation instead in the observationTemplate!

property.name: title
property.value: Request timeout value in seconds

property.name: description
property.value: Set the request timeout value in seconds. Set to 0 (zero) for no timeout.
